name: Power Up Salted Caramel Mocha
description: A cool and frosty pick-me-up. Bananas and dates create a rich, caramelly experience, mixed with a boost from protein powder. For a sweeter version, add vanilla extract.

ingredients.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend

preparation: Coarsely chop dates. Slice banana into chunks. Place both in a blender.
Add ice cubes, coffee, milk, protein blend, cocoa powder, and vanilla, if using.
Cover and blend until just slushy; add more milk, as needed, to reach desired consistency. Pour into chilled glasses.
tips: If dates are too hard or brittle, pre-soak them in boiling water until soft, about 10 min. Drain and then chop.
For easier prep, slice banana before freezing. Store slices in a freezer bag or air-tight container.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice of buttered multigrain toast, and 3 tbsp unsalted almonds.

products.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend
summary: We like to fuel our bodies and satisfy our sweet tooth with the decadent salted caramel flavour of this pea and fava bean protein. It blends effortlessly into a morning smoothie with a creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of protein powders. It also handles the heat, so we can bake it into a batch of waffles and enjoy our day knowing that we'll have that extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.
